comment: 4/25/14  gravity is at 1.021 and krausen has fallen.  Hopefully this'll still go down some more.
Brewed on 4/21/14.  Used 1 tablespoon of fermax yeast nutrient.  Used a hop bag for the hops.

Pitched at around 60.  This dry wheat beer yeast did not go off like I'm accustomed to with 3068.  Took a long time to get through the adaptive stage.  It's chugging along now but has only raised to 66.  I'm just going to let it ride and maybe heat it up later  to make sure it finishes up.  Also, as an aside, the color looks like it's going to be darker than I'd prefer.
